SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qna_question WHERE is_resolved = 'N' AND delete_flg = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE delete_flg = 0 AND (comment_status = 'Active' OR comment_status IS NULL)

SELECT notice_id as noticeId, COALESCE(category, '') as category, COALESCE(title, '') as title, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d'), '') as createdAt FROM notice ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT COALESCE(c.title, '') as title, COALESCE(u.name, '') as name, COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(cert.issued_at, '%Y-%m-%d'), '') as issuedAt FROM certificate cert INNER JOIN enrollment e ON cert.enrollment_id = e.enrollment_id LEFT JOIN course c ON e.course_id = c.course_id LEFT JOIN users u ON e.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY cert.issued_at DESC LIMIT 4
